itemInfo.itemDesc: Installing a Scarecrow in a Garden will decrease the rate of bird attacks.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)

item.name: Log
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Lumbering trees grown in every region.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
